modName: Easy Invisibility And Muffle Ring-By Nivlevarigatenio
summary: a simple invisibility and muffle ring mod.
descriptionHtml:
Easy Ring Of Invisiblity-Simple ring adding bat file
By Nivlevarigatenio
Descripition:
this mod is fairly straightforward to explain and is also very simple to use.
essentially: its a bat file that you can run through the console in game and it would instantly add a special enchanted ring,simply titled "gold ring" to your inventory.
for those fearing a virus issue: i'll explain the process that this bat does: like all bat files: it feeds a command into the game: what this command does is tell the game to fast-render
a gold ring with certain enchantments and add it to the player's inventory. that's it.
to get this mod to work,you don't need anything but a simple copy of THE ELDER SCROLLS V-SKYRIM: No DLC Or Other Modding Required.
to install the mod: simply extract the text(.txt)  file to your skyrim root folder(where the launcher and game executible is)
to get the ring in game:simply open the console throught the tild key(~) and type in:
bat PCD 
(PCD is short for "portable cloaking device")
the ring is enchanted with  simple invisiblity AND muffle effects: those making you both entirely invisible when crouching,but also muffled to fully avoid detection.
this is A CHEAT MOD! if you don't approve of cheating: simply don't download this mod.
known issues:
-sometimes it can lead to deteaction: the ring is fast-rendered by the game to ensure the console parameters the bat file feeds are met: it will work most of the time,but close proximity
to an npc or beast could lead to detection: this ring also heavly relies on your stealth skills so DON'T BLAME ME.
special thanks:
bethesda: for skyrim
skyrim modding-for skyrim awesomness
community love-for being good chaps
good luck!
author: nivlevarigatenio
